name: BlobVSRat
description:
The game was made for the ScoreSpacejam#24.

You must protect the Elder Blob by blocking the path of rat invaders with the help of its descendants. They are small, fragile creatures with the ability to reproduce quickly by merging with the body of the Elder Blob. Blobs are regularly subject to mutation, and a veteran has a better chance of producing a mutated blob...

How to play ( only mouse ) :

- Can select blob with left click.

- Can move selected blob with right click.

- Move a small blob into the large one to create another small blob.

- Space to pause game.

- Click the mouse wheel to move the camera.

Tips:

-Experience of a fight is not divided between the blobs involved. They will all gain xp.

-Blobs are attacked in order of arrival in the fight.

I'm curious about the feedback, I hope you enjoy the game, good luck and have fun !
